title:
runtime: shiny
output: html_document
keep_md: no
---

```{r engine='bash', echo=FALSE}
  ID=`grep -e 'Patient name' parrecs/rest-on.PAR | awk '{print $5}'`
  VOL=`grep -e 'Max. number of dynamics' parrecs/rest-on.PAR |  awk '{print $7}'`
  TR=`grep -e 'Repetition time' parrecs/rest-on.PAR | awk '{print $6}'`
  TE=`tail -3 parrecs/rest-on.PAR | head -1 | awk {'print $31'}`
  DIR=`grep -e 'Preparation direction' parrecs/rest-on.PAR | awk {'print $5'}`
  FOV=`grep -e 'FOV' parrecs/rest-on.PAR | awk {'print $6'}`
  PixelSpacingX=`tail -3 parrecs/rest-on.PAR | head -1 | awk {'print $29'}`
  PixelSpacingY=`tail -3 parrecs/rest-on.PAR | head -1 | awk {'print $30'}`
  echo "Subject ID                 :  $ID"
  echo "No. of Volumes             :  $VOL"
  echo "Repetition Time            :  $TR"
  echo "Echo Time                  :  $TE"
  echo "Preperation Direction      :  $DIR"
  echo "FOV                        :  $FOV"
  echo "Pixel Spacing (x,y in mm)  :  $PixelSpacingX x $PixelSpacingY"
```
